publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6282 Adam Ingram: The Rehabilitation of Offenders Act 1974 (Exclusions and Exceptions) (Scotland) Amendment Order 2010—That the Education, Lifelong Learning and Culture Committee recommends that the Rehabilitation of Offenders Act 1974 (Exclusions and Exceptions) (Scotland) Amendment Order 2010 be approved. Supported by: Michael Russell*
